definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: With everything she needed bought, Grace took a taxi home.
sentences.chinese: 所需求的都買好後，格雷斯打的回家了。

sentences.english: They have bought their air tickets already.
sentences.chinese: 她們已經買好了飛機票。

sentences.english: and I can get tickets for you and whoever else is coming with you.
sentences.chinese: 我能爲你和跟你一起來的朋友買好票。

sentences.english: After everything she needed was bought, Grace took a taxi home.
sentences.chinese: 所需要的都買好後，格雷斯打的回家了。

sentences.english: B. O/K. I will contact you with our Flight details.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我買好機票會通知你一切詳情。

sentences.english: They bolted down the gangway and took their tickets.
sentences.chinese: 他們跑下階梯，買好了票。

sentences.english: She always put money can save a province, bought me down delicious of.
sentences.chinese: 她總是把能省的錢都省下來，爲我買好喫的。

sentences.english: We ordered the blood for you. The kit's downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 血已經給你買好了，輸血包也樓下。

sentences.english: She also said she would go to Carrefour to get some good food for them.
sentences.chinese: 還說要去家樂福給他們買好喫的慰勞一下。

sentences.english: Now she could go, whatever was the need for buying flowers, taken care of.
sentences.chinese: 不管爲什麼要買花，花已經買好了，現在她可以走了。

sentences.english: Go ahead and shop for good clothes I am not stopping you.
sentences.chinese: 你要去買好衣服，我是不會攔着你的。

sentences.english: She was busy with checking in luggage and buying tickets for us.
sentences.chinese: 她忙前忙後地幫我們發運行李，買好了車票。

sentences.english: We buy a plane ticket and the flight is delayed.
sentences.chinese: 我們買好了飛機票，而航班卻被推遲了。
